title: Looking for 4 T206 cards to complete set
author: FFIMARRIOTT

posts.post_title: Looking for 4 T206 cards to complete set
posts.post_content:
I am 4 cards away from completing the T206 set (minus the "Big Four" of course). I am down to the nitty gritty and am looking for raw, or, graded 
1.0 - 2.0 of the following cards. Please provide pics and pricing if you have such cards available. Thank you.

1. Scoops Carey
2. Ty Cob (Portrait Green Background)
3. Ty Cobb (Bat on Shoulder)
4. Walter Johnson (Portrait)

I will update this list as I can...I have been on a buying spree for the last 20+ cards, as I want to get this done...it has been 31 years in the making!! (since 1989).

Thanks!!

- Michael (FFIMARRIOTT)
